name: Choking Ash
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
A 10 foot radius sphere, increased by 5 feet for every AP spent past the first, bursts into a cloud of volcanic ash. Creatures inside are blinded, while the ash heavily obscures the area. Creatures inside the ash cloud when it is created and creatures that start their turn inside or enter during their turn must succeed on a Constitution saving throw. On a failure, they lose 2 AP coughing and choking on the ash.

Creatures that exit the ash cloud are covered in the ash and leave a trail behind as they move. Until they remove the ash by spending 2 AP or being targeted by a Water or Wind spell, they can't hide or become invisible.
empower: Also deals 2d8 fire damage on a failed saving throw. A successful saving throw reduces the damage taken by half.
